text:
[Verse]
Woke up to morning light
Dreams faded from the night
Chasing shadows on the run
Time to follow the sun

[Verse 2]
Steps on the sandy shore
Footprints left and nothing more
Waves crash with a soothing hum
Time to follow the sun

[Chorus]
Follow the sun
Where the light is bright for everyone
Follow the sun
Feel the warmth and it's just begun

[Verse 3]
Birds flying up so high
Stretching wings across the sky
In this moment we are one
Time to follow the sun

[Bridge]
Through the rain and through the storm
In the dark and in the warm
We will always have our fun
Time to follow the sun

[Chorus]
Follow the sun
Where the light is bright for everyone
Follow the sun
Feel the warmth and it's just begun
title: Follow the Sun
